Rapid Search is a lightweight and useful Search Tool Extension designed for OPTIMIZED your Search Experience.

*Rapid Search will provide an access to our top notch blnq-search.com search engine optimizer (by CHANGING  the browser's default search engine provider).

The search features uses within he extension and blnq-search.com will may provided by Bing / Yahoo or Google.

*Please read carefully: by installing the Rapid Search extension , you agree to install this extension, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy.
